title: Breathtaking Lake Taupo Getaway
description: Immerse yourself in one of the most picturesque regions in the world, New Zealand's Lake Taupo. Spend two nights at Hilton Lake Taupo and enjoy delicious daily buffet breakfasts, NZ$50 food and beverage credit to use at the incredible onsite restaurant led by celebrity chef Gareth Stewart and enjoy a late 1pm checkout for two.
offer_address: 100/80 Napier-Taupo Rd, Hilltop, Taupo 3330, New Zealand

title: Hilton Getaway on the Spectacular Lake Taupo
description: Immerse yourself in one of the most picturesque regions in the world, New Zealand's Lake Taupo - the largest and most impressive lake in the country. Enjoy a relaxing getaway nestled among epic natural scenery at the elegant Hilton Lake Taupo, and indulge with delicious daily buffet breakfasts, NZ$50 food and beverage credit to use at the incredible onsite restaurant led by celebrity chef Gareth Stewart and a late 1pm checkout.
offer_address: 100/80 Napier-Taupo Rd, Hilltop, Taupo 3330, New Zealand
